row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PRV.JOB.GET_ISSUE@GENERIC
row.description: Get Issue from Jira by ID or Key

row.process:
: IF &$PLATFORM# EQ "WINDOWS" @echo off : ENDIF
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.COMMON_LOGGING : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Issue ID or Key" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_JIRA_ISSUE_ID_KEY#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Fields" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_JIRA_FIELDS#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE
! Define action specific java options and values : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "GetIssueAction"
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_CMD
: SET &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_JIRA_ISSUE_ID_KEY# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JIRA_CMD#, " -issueid &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: IF &UC4RB_JIRA_FIELDS# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_JIRA_FIELDS# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JIRA_CMD#, " -fields &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
: PRINT "Prepared Command : &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD#"
! Access key is decrypted and send to jar as argument : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_JIRA_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
! Set Execution Environment : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
! Invoking java binary : SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD# -password "%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%" : CASE "UNIX" &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD# -password "$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD" : OTHER : ENDSWITCH
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** GET ISSUE ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** GET ISSUE ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

row.post_process:
! Publishing issue details in an AE variable :SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE")
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP",,"COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &KEY# = "UC4RB_JIRA_ISSUE_DETAILS" : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_ISSUE_DETAILS# = "&VALUE#" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_JIRA_ISSUE_DETAILS#,,"TOP" : TERM_PROCESS : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_ISSUE_DETAILS# = "" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_JIRA_ISSUE_DETAILS#,,"TOP" :ENDIF
